CaseStatus.name: CaseStatus
CaseStatus.description: Represents the status of a Case, such as New, On Hold, or In Process.

ApiName.description: Uniquely identifies a picklist value so it can be retrieved without using an id or primary label.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether this case status value represents a closed Case (true) or not (false). Multiple case status values can represent a closed Case.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether this is the default case status value (true) or not (false) in the picklist.

MasterLabel.description: Label for this case status value. This display value is the internal label that does not get translated.

SortOrder.description: Number used to sort this value in the case status picklist. These numbers are not guaranteed to be sequential, as some previous case status values might have been deleted.
